title: OFBH Notification 2026 - Apply Offline for Safety Officer Posts
description: The Ordnance Factory Bhusawal (OFBH) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Safety Officer Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Any Degree or Diploma can apply for the OFBH Notification 2026. The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, ...
